column1: * 1918 - J.R.R. Tolkien is officially released from Brooklands Officers Hospital
* 1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Clyde S. Kilby (11 October 1966).
* 1979 - The Jackanory episode "The Clouds Burst" is aired on the BBC.
* 1996 - Tyalië Tyelelliéva issue Tyalië Tyelelliéva 9 is published.
* 1999 - Principal photography for The Lord of the Rings (film series) begins.

column2: Ulmo speaks to Tuor and instructs him to go to Gondolin to deliver a message to Turgon.

column1: ** Glorfindel drives three Nazgûl off the Last Bridge of Mitheithel and pursues them westward. He meets two others who flee southward. He leaves a beryl on the Bridge. He starts looking for the travellers.
